description: Butterfly bush (Buddleja davidii 'Nanho Purple') is an amazing plant for the garden! With strong, upright branches clothed with profuse blooms, it boasts an attractive deep violet-purple flower clusters throughout the summer. It's sturdy, tireless and tolerant of numerous conditions, making it ideal for gardeners of all levels. The blooms of butterfly bush 'Nanho Purple' have a unique spicy fragrance and are a great nectar source for butterflies and bees. Plus, it is easy to care for since it is drought-tolerant and deer-resistant. Butterfly bush 'Nanho Purple' is truly a gardener's delight!
